author: Cameron Joseph, Michael Learmonth
title: Trump Is Scapegoating the WHO — But Failed to Confirm a U.S. Representative for 3 Years
description: Trump and the Senate GOP ignored the World Health Organization. Then came the new coronavirus pandemic.
